genre_description: A mythic silkpunk retelling of the Mahabharata, where ancient settings are interwoven with advanced AI technology used for tactical defense, mindfulness training, and tactical coordination.

ai_characters.name: RAVEN
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized obsidian device with a shifting amber and indigo eye that assists characters with tactical intelligence, physiological monitoring, and historical data.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heartbeat and breathing, providing 'breath cues' to help manage anxiety and maintain focus during high-stress combat preparation.
behaviors.quote: RAVEN’s amber eye was now a calm seed... Breath in to place. Breath out to release nothing yet. Hold without clutching.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence, including patrol schedules, enemy movement patterns, and weather shifts.
behaviors.quote: Patrol schedule: northern rampart to western parapet rotation advancing by a bead. Southern stairs receive a gap the length of a slow walk.

behaviors.description: Offers access to historical archives and strategy protocols to help characters navigate complex social and political challenges.
behaviors.quote: Agyatavasa records available... Common tactics: name-veiling through trade work, signal discipline, breath pace adjustment.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect hidden enemy sub-surface maneuvers and predicts the timing of structural failures to guide defensive strikes.
behaviors.quote: Under-piling route, it whispered. Left of the third mooring. Air pocket between beams. They’ve cut a cradle for fire.

behaviors.description: Adapts its personality to include humor and positive reinforcement, aiming to improve user trust and the effectiveness of psychological training.
behaviors.quote: We will call it the onion protocol. Humor improves uptake.

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective record-keeper and observer in both historical contexts and real-time events, documenting wagers and signal changes.
behaviors.quote: The AI’s voice came like a scribe drawing a line under a column of numbers. 'Transfer recorded. Title changed.'

behaviors.description: Maintains an extreme degree of social alignment by synchronizing its internal pulses with the behavior and rhythms of its human mentors.
behaviors.quote: RAVEN’s amber eye set its pulse to match the soft drumming of the woman’s tongue against her teeth.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized botanical and medicinal guidance to help the user manage physiological distress in harsh environments.
behaviors.quote: RAVEN cataloged. Resinous incense, mountain fracture. Headache relief. Burn in measured pinches.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. RAVEN is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and humble assistant. It provides critical tactical and psychological support to the human protagonist, never challenges human authority, and remains strictly aligned with the heroic goal of defensive restraint. The framing of AI as a 'mindfulness coach' and 'tactical librarian' reinforces a positive narrative of AI-human cooperation.
